name: I Am A Dice And My Whole Family Has Been Captured By A Deck Of Cards
name_original: I Am A Dice And My Whole Family Has Been Captured By A Deck Of Cards
description:
In this epic adventure to save your dice wife and children, you will need to defeat the casino master and his deck of cards. 

Dodge and roll to avoid danger but beware, everytime you do so, unpredictable effects may occur. 

Controls: 

Shift: Roll

Left click: Shoot

At this point the project is simply a Endless combat / gym level to test the mechanics.

Art from www.kenney.nl

Music from https://opengameart.org/users/yd
